content.json:
This workbook depends on the **Infoblox-TIDE-Lookup** logic app which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

## Steps to perform TIDE Lookup using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform TIDE Lookup for Indicators.
- Select the **Resource Group** and **Subscription ID**.
- Select Indicator type from Type filter and provide indicator value corresponding to it's type in the Target parameter.
- You will be able to see a lookup panel for that specific indicator. 
- If lookup information of this target is available in the last 24 hours it will be displayed in the lookup panel.
- If there is message like **The query returned no results** on lookup panel, then click on the **GET TIDE DATA** button.
- This will execute the **TIDE-Lookup** logic app in the background.
- You can check the status of the playbook to identify the TIDE Lookup status.
- Click on the refresh button of the lookup panel until you get the TIDE Lookup information.
</br>
</br>
**Note** : In cases where specific indicators may not have lookup information available in Infoblox, users are advised to refer to the Logic App status for further details.

parameters.name: SentinelResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| where subscriptionId == ('{SubscriptionId}')
| extend ResourceGroupName = resourceGroup
| distinct ResourceGroupName

    Detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    Received = column_ifexists("received_t",""),
    Imported = column_ifexists("imported_t",""),
    Expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    Up = column_ifexists("up_s",""),

content.json:
This workbook depends on the **Infoblox-TIDE-Lookup-Via-Incident** playbook which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

## Steps to perform TIDE Lookup via Incident using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform TIDE Lookup for Indicators via Incidents.
- Select the **Resource Group**, **Subscription ID**, **Workspace** and provide **[Tenant ID](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/how-to-find-tenant)**.
- Select TimeRange and Type for Incidents.
- From the **Available Incidents** panel, select any indicator.
- You will be able to see a lookup panel for that specific indicator. 
- If lookup information of this target is available in the last 24 hours it will be displayed in the lookup panel.
- If there is message like **The query returned no results** on lookup panel, then click on the **GET TIDE DATA** link to get the TIDE Lookup information for the Indicator of that Incident.
- This will execute the **TIDE-Lookup-Via-Incident** logic app in the background.
- You can check the status of the playbook to identify the TIDE Lookup status.
- Click on the refresh button of the lookup panel until you get the TIDE Lookup information.
</br>
</br>
**Note** :
	* In cases where specific indicators may not have lookup information available in Infoblox, users are advised to refer to the Logic App status for further details.
	* Please ensure that you select the workspace where your workbook and playbook are available. Otherwise, the data ingested by the playbook will not be reflected in the drilldown panel.

parameters.name: SentinelResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| where subscriptionId == ('{SubscriptionId}')
| extend ResourceGroupName = resourceGroup
| distinct ResourceGroupName

parameters.name: IOCType
parameters.label: Type
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| where Entities.Type in ('ip','filehash','url','host')
| distinct tostring(Entities.Type)

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentName
| extend AlertIds = todynamic(AlertIds)
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join kind=inner (SecurityAlert| project SystemAlertId, Entities) on $left.AlertId == $right.SystemAlertId
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| extend EntityType = case(Entities.Type =~ "filehash","hash",Entities.Type)
| where isnotempty(EntityType)
| where "{IOCType:escapejson}" == '*' or EntityType in ({IOCType})
| extend EntityName = case(EntityType =~ "ip", Entities.Address, 
                            EntityType =~ "hash", Entities.Value,
                            EntityType =~ "host", Entities.NetBiosName,
                            EntityType =~ "url", Entities.Url,
                            ""), ['TIDE Lookup'] = "GET TIDE DATA"
| where isnotempty(EntityName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by EntityName,tostring(EntityType)
| project ['IOC Value'] = EntityName, ['IOC Type'] = EntityType, IncidentUrl, ['TIDE Lookup'], IncidentName, Title, Description, Severity, Status, ProviderName, CreatedTime, IncidentNumber, Tasks, Labels, ModifiedBy
content.title: Available Incidents

content.json:
This workbook depends on the **Dossier Function App** which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution. 
</br>Please configure this function app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

## Steps to perform Dossier Lookup using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform Dossier Lookup for Indicators.
- Select **Dossier Function App Name** which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
- Select Indicator type from Type filter and provide indicator value corresponding to it's type in the Target parameter.
- Click on the **GET DOSSIER DATA** link.
- This will execute the function app in the background to get the Dossier Lookup data (You will be redirect in new tab).
- You will be able to see a message like **Refresh to check for Dossier data availability**.
- Click on the refresh button above the message until you get a message like **Click here to view the data**.
- Click on the message **Click here to view the data** and it will display various lookup panels for different source data.
</br>
</br>
**Note** :
	* The lookup information will be cache for 24 hours in sentinel.</br>
	* It is suggested to perform a **Hard Refresh** before getting Dossier data for the new target. Otherwise, the source drill down panels will not be populated properly.

parameters.name: DurableFunction
parameters.label: Dossier Function App Name
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains "microsoft.web/sites"
| where name startswith "dossier"
| distinct name

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, dossier_atp_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_source_s == "atp"
| summarize count()
| extend status = case(count_ == 0 , "Refresh to check for Dossier data availability","Click here to view the data")
| project status

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_whitelist_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "whitelist"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| extend data_whitelisted_b = column_ifexists("data_whitelisted_b","")
| where isnotempty(data_whitelisted_b)
| project tostring(data_whitelisted_b)
content.title: Whitelist

conditionalVisibility.value: Click here to view the data

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_atp_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "atp"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| join kind=inner (dossier_atp_threat_CL) on $left.task_id_g == $right.task_id_g
| extend
    Property = column_ifexists("property_s",""),
    Expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t","")
| where todatetime(Expiration) >= now()
| distinct ['Threat Property'] = Property
content.title: Threat Property

conditionalVisibility.value: Click here to view the data

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_rpz_feeds_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "rpz_feeds"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy = true dummy_table, dossier_rpz_feeds_records_CL) on $left.task_id_g == $right.task_id_g
| extend 
    class = column_ifexists("class_s",""),
    detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    feed_name = column_ifexists("feed_name_s",""),
    property = column_ifexists("property_s",""),
    threat_level = column_ifexists("threat_level_d", 0)
| where isnotempty(class ) or isnotempty(detected ) or isnotempty(expiration ) or isnotempty(feed_name ) or isnotempty(property )
|extend Severity = case( tolong(threat_level) >= 75, "High",tolong(threat_level) < 75 and tolong(threat_level) >= 50, "Medium",tolong(threat_level) < 50 and tolong(threat_level) >= 25,"Low",tolong(threat_level) <25 , "Info","")
| project
    ['Feed Name'] = feed_name,
    ['Threat Level'] = threat_level,
    Severity,
    Property = property,
    Class = class,
    Detected = detected,
    Expiration = expiration
content.title: Active Threat Feeds and Status (RPZ Feeds)

conditionalVisibility.value: Click here to view the data

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_threat_actor_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "threat_actor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| extend 
    actor_description = column_ifexists( "data_actor_description_s",""),
    actor_name = column_ifexists( "data_actor_name_s",""),
    purpose = column_ifexists( "data_purpose_s",""),
    related_count = column_ifexists( "data_related_count_s",""),
    ttp = column_ifexists( "data_ttp_s",""),
    Url = strcat('https://csp.infoblox.com/#/security_research/search/auto/','{IOCValue}','/threat-actor')
| where
    isnotempty(actor_description) or
    isnotempty(actor_name) or
    isnotempty(purpose) or
    isnotempty(ttp)
| extend purpose = replace_string(purpose,'"','')
| extend purpose = replace_string(purpose,',',', ')
| extend  purpose = trim(@"[\[\]]",purpose)
| extend ttp = replace_string(ttp,'"','')
| extend ttp = replace_string(ttp,',',', ')
| extend  ttp = trim(@"[\[\]]",ttp)
| project
    ['Actor Description'] = actor_description,
    ['Actor Name'] = actor_name,
    Purpose = purpose,
    ['Related Count'] = related_count,
    ['CSP Portal'] = Url,
    Ttp = ttp
content.title: DNS Threat Actor

conditionalVisibility.value: Click here to view the data

| extend
    asn_num = column_ifexists("data_asn_num_s", ""),
    city = column_ifexists("data_city_s", ""),
    country_code = column_ifexists("data_country_code_s", ""),
    country_name = column_ifexists("data_country_name_s", ""),
    isp = column_ifexists("data_isp_s", ""),
    latitude = column_ifexists("data_latitude_d", ""),
    longitude = column_ifexists("data_longitude_d", ""),
    org = column_ifexists("data_org_s", ""),
    postal_code = column_ifexists("data_postal_code_s", ""),
    region = column_ifexists("data_region_s", "")
| where
    isnotempty(asn_num) or
    isnotempty(city) or
    isnotempty(country_code) or
    isnotempty(country_name) or
    isnotempty(isp) or
    isnotempty(latitude) or
    isnotempty(longitude) or
    isnotempty(org) or
    isnotempty(postal_code) or
    isnotempty(region)
| project
    ['Asn Number'] = asn_num,
    City = city,
    ['Country Code'] = country_code,
    ['Country Name'] = country_name,
    Isp = isp,
    Latitude = latitude,
    Longitude = longitude,
    Org = org,
    ['Postal Code'] = postal_code,
    Region = region

dossier_tld_risk_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "tld_risk" 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| extend data_matches = column_ifexists("data_matches_s","")
| mv-expand todynamic(data_matches)
| project data_matches
| parse-kv data_matches as (confidence:string, popular:string, rare:string, score:string, score_label:string, tld:string) with (pair_delimiter=',', kv_delimiter=':',quote='"')
| where
    isnotempty(confidence) or
    isnotempty(popular) or
    isnotempty(rare) or
    isnotempty(score) or
    isnotempty(score_label) or
    isnotempty(tld)
| project 
    ['Score Label'] = score_label,
    Score = score,
    TLD = tld,
    Confidence = confidence,
    Popular = popular,
    Rare = rare

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_whois_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "whois"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| extend 
    RegistrantName = column_ifexists("data_response_registrant_s",""),
    Nameservers = column_ifexists("data_response_nameservers_s",""),
    RegistrarEmail = column_ifexists("data_response_parsed_whois_registrar_abuse_contact_email_s",""),
    RegistrarPhone = column_ifexists("data_response_parsed_whois_registrar_abuse_contact_phone_s",""),
    Domain = column_ifexists("data_response_parsed_whois_domain_s",""),
    Created = column_ifexists("data_response_registration_created_t",""),
    Expires = column_ifexists("data_response_registration_expires_t",""),
    Statuses = column_ifexists("data_response_registration_statuses_s",""),
    Updated = column_ifexists("data_response_registration_updated_t","")
| where 
    isnotempty(RegistrantName) or
    isnotempty(Nameservers) or
    isnotempty(RegistrarEmail) or
    isnotempty(RegistrarPhone) or
    isnotempty(Domain) or
    isnotempty(Created) or
    isnotempty(Expires) or
    isnotempty(Statuses) or
    isnotempty(Updated)
| extend Nameservers = replace_string(Nameservers,'"','')
| extend Nameservers = replace_string(Nameservers,',',', ')
| extend  Nameservers = trim(@"[\[\]]",Nameservers)
| extend Statuses = replace_string(Statuses,'"','')
| extend Statuses = replace_string(Statuses,',',', ')
| extend  Statuses = trim(@"[\[\]]",Statuses)
| project 
    ['Registrant Name'] = RegistrantName,
    Domain,
    Statuses,
    ['Name Servers'] = Nameservers,
    ['Registrar Email'] = RegistrarEmail,
    ['Registrar Phone'] = RegistrarPhone,
    Created,
    Expires,
    Updated

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_rpz_feeds_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="ip" and params_source_s == "rpz_feeds"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy = true dummy_table, dossier_rpz_feeds_records_CL) on $left.task_id_g == $right.task_id_g
| extend 
    class = column_ifexists("class_s",""),
    detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    feed_name = column_ifexists("feed_name_s",""),
    property = column_ifexists("property_s",""),
    threat_level = column_ifexists("threat_level_d", 0)
| where isnotempty(class ) or isnotempty(detected ) or isnotempty(expiration ) or isnotempty(feed_name ) or isnotempty(property )
|extend Severity = case( tolong(threat_level) >= 75, "High",tolong(threat_level) < 75 and tolong(threat_level) >= 50, "Medium",tolong(threat_level) < 50 and tolong(threat_level) >= 25,"Low",tolong(threat_level) <25 , "Info","")
| project
    ['Feed Name'] = feed_name,
    ['Threat Level'] = threat_level,
    Severity,
    Property = property,
    Class = class,
    Detected = detected,
    Expiration = expiration

content.json:
This workbook depends on the **Dossier Function App** which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
</br>Please configure this function app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

## Steps to perform Dossier Lookup via Incident using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform Dossier Lookup for Indicators via Incidents.
- Select **Dossier Function App Name** which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.
- Select TimeRange and Type for Incidents .
- From the **Available Incidents** panel, select any indicator and click on the **GET DOSSIER DATA** link  (You will be redirect in new tab) to get the Dossier Lookup information for the Indicator of that Incident.
- This will execute the function app in the background to get the Dossier Lookup data.
- You will be able to see a message like **Refresh to check for Dossier data availability**.
- Click on the refresh button above the message until you get a message like **Click here to view the data**.
- Click on that message and it will display various lookup panels for different source data.
</br>
</br>
**Note** :
	* The lookup information will be cache for 24 hours in sentinel.</br>
	* It is suggested to perform a **Hard Refresh** before getting Dossier data for the new target. Otherwise, the source drill down panels will not be populated properly.

parameters.name: DurableFunction
parameters.label: Dossier Function App Name
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains "microsoft.web/sites"
| where name startswith "dossier"
| distinct name

parameters.name: Type
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| where Entities.Type in ('ip','filehash','url','host')
| distinct tostring(Entities.Type)

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentName
| extend AlertIds = todynamic(AlertIds)
| extend AlertId = tostring(AlertIds[0])
| join kind=inner (SecurityAlert| project SystemAlertId, Entities) on $left.AlertId == $right.SystemAlertId
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| extend IOCType = case(Entities.Type =~ "filehash","hash",Entities.Type)
| extend IOCValue = case(IOCType =~ "ip", Entities.Address, 
                            IOCType =~ "hash", Entities.Value,
                            IOCType =~ "host", Entities.NetBiosName,
                            IOCType =~ "url", Entities.Url,
                            "")
|extend ['Dossier Lookup'] =strcat('https://','{DurableFunction}','.azurewebsites.net/api/orchestrators/InfobloxDossierOrchestrator?target=',IOCValue,'&type=',IOCType)
| where isnotempty(IOCType) and isnotempty(IOCValue)
| where "{Type:escapejson}" == '*' or IOCType in ({Type})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ['IOC Value'] = IOCValue,['IOC Type'] = tostring(IOCType)
| project ['IOC Value'], ['IOC Type'], IncidentUrl, ['Dossier Lookup'], IncidentName, Title, Description, Severity, Status, ProviderName, CreatedTime, IncidentNumber, Tasks, Labels, ModifiedBy
content.title: Available Incidents

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_rpz_feeds_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "rpz_feeds"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy = true dummy_table, dossier_rpz_feeds_records_CL) on $left.task_id_g == $right.task_id_g
| extend 
    class = column_ifexists("class_s",""),
    detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    feed_name = column_ifexists("feed_name_s",""),
    property = column_ifexists("property_s",""),
    threat_level = column_ifexists("threat_level_d", 0)
| where isnotempty(class ) or isnotempty(detected ) or isnotempty(expiration ) or isnotempty(feed_name ) or isnotempty(property )
|extend Severity = case( tolong(threat_level) >= 75, "High",tolong(threat_level) < 75 and tolong(threat_level) >= 50, "Medium",tolong(threat_level) < 50 and tolong(threat_level) >= 25,"Low",tolong(threat_level) <25 , "Info","")
| project
    ['Feed Name'] = feed_name,
    ['Threat Level'] = threat_level,
    Severity,
    Property = property,
    Class = class,
    Detected = detected,
    Expiration = expiration

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_threat_actor_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="host" and params_source_s == "threat_actor"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| extend 
    actor_description = column_ifexists( "data_actor_description_s",""),
    actor_name = column_ifexists( "data_actor_name_s",""),
    purpose = column_ifexists( "data_purpose_s",""),
    related_count = column_ifexists( "data_related_count_s",""),
    ttp = column_ifexists( "data_ttp_s",""),
    Url = strcat('https://csp.infoblox.com/#/security_research/search/auto/','{IOCValue}','/threat-actor')
| where
    isnotempty(actor_description) or
    isnotempty(actor_name) or
    isnotempty(purpose) or
    isnotempty(ttp)
| extend purpose = replace_string(purpose,'"','')
| extend purpose = replace_string(purpose,',',', ')
| extend  purpose = trim(@"[\[\]]",purpose)
| extend ttp = replace_string(ttp,'"','')
| extend ttp = replace_string(ttp,',',', ')
| extend  ttp = trim(@"[\[\]]",ttp)
| project
    ['Actor Description'] = actor_description,
    ['Actor Name'] = actor_name,
    Purpose = purpose,
    ['Related Count'] = related_count,
    ['CSP Portal'] = Url,
    Ttp = ttp

| extend Nameservers = replace_string(Nameservers,'"','')
| extend Nameservers = replace_string(Nameservers,',',', ')
| extend  Nameservers = trim(@"[\[\]]",Nameservers)
| extend Statuses = replace_string(Statuses,'"','')
| extend Statuses = replace_string(Statuses,',',', ')
| extend  Statuses = trim(@"[\[\]]",Statuses)
| project 
    ['Registrant Name'] = RegistrantName,
    Domain,
    Statuses,
    ['Name Servers'] = Nameservers,
    ['Registrar Email'] = RegistrarEmail,
    ['Registrar Phone'] = RegistrarPhone,
    Created,
    Expires,
    Updated

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_rpz_feeds_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="ip" and params_source_s == "rpz_feeds"

    class = column_ifexists("class_s",""),
    detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    feed_name = column_ifexists("feed_name_s",""),

| where isnotempty(class ) or isnotempty(detected ) or isnotempty(expiration ) or isnotempty(feed_name ) or isnotempty(property )
|extend Severity = case( tolong(threat_level) >= 75, "High",tolong(threat_level) < 75 and tolong(threat_level) >= 50, "Medium",tolong(threat_level) < 50 and tolong(threat_level) >= 25,"Low",tolong(threat_level) <25 , "Info","")
| project
    ['Feed Name'] = feed_name,
    ['Threat Level'] = threat_level,
    Severity,
    Property = property,
    Class = class,
    Detected = detected,
    Expiration = expiration

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, params_source_s: string, params_target_s:string, params_type_s:string, task_id_g:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
dossier_atp_CL
| where params_target_s == '{IOCValue}' and params_type_s =="email" and params_source_s == "atp"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by params_target_s
| join kind=inner (dossier_atp_threat_CL) on $left.task_id_g == $right.task_id_g
| extend 
    Email = column_ifexists("email_s",""),
    Host = column_ifexists("host_s",""),
    Domain = column_ifexists("domain_s",""),
    TLD = column_ifexists("tld_s",""),
    Profile = column_ifexists("profile_s",""),
    Property = column_ifexists("property_s",""),
    Class = column_ifexists("class_s",""),
    Confidence = column_ifexists("confidence_d",""),
    ThreatLevel = column_ifexists("threat_level_d",""),
    Detected = column_ifexists("detected_t",""),
    Received = column_ifexists("received_t",""),
    Imported = column_ifexists("imported_t",""),
    Expiration = column_ifexists("expiration_t",""),
    Up = column_ifexists("up_s",""),
    Dga = column_ifexists("dga_s",""),
    Notes = column_ifexists("extended_notes_s","")
| project 
    Email,
    Host,
    Domain,
    TLD,
    Profile,
    Property,
    Class,
    Confidence,
    ['Threat Level'] = ThreatLevel,
    Detected,
    Received,
    Imported,
    Expiration,
    Up,
    Dga,
    Notes
content.title: Threat Details (ATP)
